message.body: Hey! What time do you think you're gonna start tomorrow?
11-12 probably
K soo what time should I expect you? 3-4?
More like 4-7 depending on traffic and when I leave. Do you know where I can park near you?
Ah okay. Yeah there's a weekend lot right by my dorm.
Ok. I will text you when I leave. From then it's 5-6 hours, 7 if there is traffic. Actually it might be like half an hour less because I don't have to go as far east?
It's about 1.5-2 hrs from Amherst to Needham. So it's should be 3.5-4.5 hrs from Haverford. Plus traffic
Yeah but it's not on the way - it's sort of a different direction. Google maps says 4 hours 50 min.
Okay. Well I'm sure it'll be less given that you practically made it home before in 5 hrs
Truth
Also I told Peter I'd go to his show at 8
Yeah, he told me. Yay! I'm excited you're coming to visit!
Me toooo!
Also what is the sleeping situation? What should I bring?
I don't have a sleeping bag or aero bed. All I have my twin bed. I do have an extra set of sheets and an extra pillow
Blanket?
You can use my comforter or I have two throw blankets.
Sweet
(Throw blankets are good)
Cool. Also they crank the heat at night so it's actually really warm, normally temperature-d people have confirmed this
Ok awesome, good to know. My room is an igloo...
Haha oh the irony
Do you want me to bring my piercing salt spray? Or is it doing okay?
Oh that would be great!
Ok
Also do you happen to have an extra command strip for a medium size hook?
And thanks!
Yep!
Excellent. I knew there was a reason for our friendship
Also:ï¿¼
Hahahahaha obviously
Watch twins!
This is true. It reminds me of nithya's friend Susie, my dad used to make her a snack and forbid from eating it, so she could come to our house after school and eat after practice.
Yep
Oh! Btw do you have directions for me of how to get to the place I can park?
Um did you already print directions to umass?
I don't have anything yet. I know to route 91 by heart, so I need what to do after that
Leaving hc
Yay! Call me when you're at the parking lot, I'll come out to meet you.
Ok!
I'm outside
Again, I've gone outside.

I figured it out! We thought it got so late super fast last night because it actually got late abnormally fast! It was 3:20 because it would have been 2:20 but it went from 1:59 to 3:00. Omg I kept getting so confused.
